Package jakarta.nosql.mapping.document

Interface DocumentWorkflow

  • public interface DocumentWorkflow
    This implementation defines the workflow to insert an Entity on DocumentTemplate. The default implementation follows:

    DocumentEventPersistManager.firePreEntity(Object)

    DocumentEventPersistManager.firePreDocumentEntity(Object)

    DocumentEntityConverter.toDocument(Object)

    DocumentEventPersistManager.firePreDocument(DocumentEntity)}

    Database alteration

    DocumentEventPersistManager.firePostDocument(DocumentEntity)

    DocumentEventPersistManager.firePostEntity(Object)

    DocumentEventPersistManager.firePostDocumentEntity(Object)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      <T> T flow​(T entity, UnaryOperator<DocumentEntity> action)
      Executes the workflow to do an interaction on a database document collection.

    • Method Detail

      • flow

        <T> T flow​(T entity,
           UnaryOperator<DocumentEntity> action)
        Executes the workflow to do an interaction on a database document collection.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the entity type
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to be saved
        action - the alteration to be executed on database
        Returns:
        after the workflow the entity response
        See Also:
        DocumentTemplate#insert(Object) DocumentTemplate#update(Object)
